english.segment1: Build it up, I'll tear it down. My finger in the strings connected to your hands. I dance the mockery, a theme of decadence. Now I am sinking in this violence. This time, emancipation is my right
english.segment2: This is what I want, for you to die. This is what I want, to be alive
english.segment3: Scene of complacency, an apathetic mind. But when it's brought to light, I see a king on a borrowed throne. Right now, the violence taking over. This time, regimes are changing in my mind
english.segment4: I'm so sorry, my old friend, I'm leaving you tonight. So caught in this moment, the last breath of your life.
